sections.text:
71-8231.State trauma medical director, defined.

State trauma medical director means a physician licensed under the Uniform Credentialing Act who advises the department and carries out duties under the Statewide Trauma System Act.

SourceLaws 1997, LB 626, § 31;Laws 1999, LB 594, § 63;Laws 2007, LB296, § 690;Laws 2007, LB463, § 1304;Laws 2023, LB227, § 104.

Cross ReferencesUniform Credentialing Act, see section 38-101.
